verbose_text: Accordingly, visualization of protoporphyrin IX (PpIX) red fluorescence induced by oral administration of 5-aminolevulinic acid (ALA) has become standard-of-care for resection of high-grade glioma in Germany based on outcomes from a randomized multi-center Phase III trial comparing progression free survival in patients undergoing either fluorescence guided resection or conventional resection under white light visualization XREF_BIBR.
evidence: PpIX) red fluorescence induced by oral administration of 5-aminolevulinic acid
